Hi Jack,

I hope all is well.

We are looking into this, would you be able to allow access joel@wolfiq.com.au to view the zip files?

Hi Heath

Can we action the following two items

see video: https://www.loom.com/share/ef9f358767c0499dab914521ef79fe1d?sid=e887971e-f306-452c-adb3-6835debc3ae7



1. Can we create a shop item for consultation at reduced cost of $300 for myself (we are experimenting with a Facebook/Instagram offer for consult)
Like this https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/product/consultation
but with special limited time offering for reduced price consult
Can we make this shop item not visible on the website (like we did for the Dr JZ bad reviews) that way prospects can only locate this on the social media button during campaign

2. Also can we add the following patients to PonyTail Facelift page and create a gallery page for brow/eyelids

34 you Pony Tail lift.zip
38 yo Pony Tail Before and After.zip

Jack


Dr Jack Zoumaras
